results.title: Association of metformin use among diabetics and the incidence of primary open-angle glaucoma - The Chennai Eye Disease Incidence Study
results.text_hl: Usage of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was not found to be associated with incident @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@.

results.title: Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature.
results.text_hl: We then explore the sparse but promising retrospective clinical data on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential protective role in @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@DR@@@, @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@, and @DISEASE_Uveitis @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@uveitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Amin SV, Khanna S, Parvar SP, Shaw LT, Dao D, Hariprasad SM, Skondra D. Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature. Exp Biol Med (Maywood). 2022 Feb;247(4):317-329. PMID: 35068220

results.title: Association Between Long-Term Metformin Use and Risk of Open-Angle Glaucoma in Patients With Diabetes Mellitus.
results.text_hl: ...PRCIS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ use wasn't dose-dependently linked to @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@open-angle glaucoma@@@.

results.title: Association between metformin use and the risk of developing open-angle glaucoma among patients with diabetes: a retrospective cohort study and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: In this study, we investigated the association between @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@OAG@@@.

results.title: Comparative Effects of GLP-1 Receptor Agonists and Metformin on Glaucoma Risk in Type 2 Diabetes Patients.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ treated with GLP-1 receptor agonists had a significantly decreased risk of developing @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@ compared to those on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ at 1 year (RR 0.59, 95% CI 0.39-0.88), 2 years (RR 0.50, 95% CI 0.32-0.78), and 3 years (RR 0.59, 95% CI 0.37-0.94).

citations.NLM: Muayad J, Loya A, Hussain ZS, Chauhan MZ, Alsoudi AF, De Francesco T, Ike K Ahmed I. Comparative Effects of GLP-1 Receptor Agonists and Metformin on Glaucoma Risk in Type 2 Diabetes Patients. Ophthalmology. 2024 Aug 23;():. PMID: 39182626

results.title: Commentary - Association of metformin use among diabetics and the incidence of primary open-angle glaucoma - The Chennai Eye Disease Incidence Study
results.text_hl: In their study, the administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ did not halt the progression of @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@.

results.title: Association of Diabetes Medication With Open-Angle Glaucoma, Age-Related Macular Degeneration, and Cataract in the Rotterdam Study.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@T2D@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@OAG@@@ (OR, 0.18; 95% CI, 0.08-0.41; P < .001).

results.title: Novel potential drugs for the treatment of primary open-angle glaucoma using protein-protein interaction network analysis
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, as with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin hydrochloride@@@, no specific information is available, particularly regarding the role of @CHEMICAL_ixazomib @CHEMICAL_MESH:C548400 @@@ixazomib citrate@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@.

results.title: Metformin protects trabecular meshwork against oxidative injury via activating integrin/ROCK signals
results.text_hl: This study provides new insights into @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ use and preclinical evidence for the potential treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@primary open-angle glaucoma@@@.
